snippet: The United States Golf Association will be getting rid of the United States Amateur Public Links in favor of an Amateur Four-Ball Championship that will start in 2015.
abstract: United States Golf Association will drop the men's and women's United States Amateur Public Links Championship in favor of Amateur Four-Ball Championship that will start in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The United States Golf Association will be getting rid of the United States Amateur Public Links in favor of an Amateur Four-Ball Championship that will start in 2015.

headline.seo: United States Golf Association Adding Four-Ball Championship
